title: [GAMEPLAY] BattleCast Cho' Gath
body: On _low graphics_, Battle Cast Cho'Gath's **W - Feral Scream** is hard to see. It literally blends in with the ground, and it's pretty unfair to those players who have low graphics. I do not have a screenshot or video of it, but if this ability can be more visible, it would be great!

replies.body: You should post this in Gameplay since it's technically not a bug
In this case, it's totally a bug 'cause it skews gameplay visibility. :)

quick question about cho skin, is gentleman cho voice supposed to be this low or is it a bug too.
I'm sure he crack some damn joke but it's hardly noticeble anytime there is action near him (unlike other recent random voiceline like rakan/xayah/reworked champ), to the point only one word of the full sentence is understandable
Gooood question! I can follow up with one of our sound designers and have him take a look. :)
Hmm, thought that would be more of a "balancing" issue instead of a bug. Oh well, to each their own

In the 7.18 _bugfixes_ it says " Dark Star Kha'Zix's evolved E- Leap VFX are now more visible on low and very low graphics settings "
I'm pretty sure this is the right place to post it.
Yep, you're in the right spot!

Hey ak521! 

Thanks for the report! 

I got you covered with the screenshots. :P

https://imgur.com/xQn3IIu

I'm with you on this one; a large portion of players play on very low settings, and it sucks that you don't get the same experience of a legendary skin when the VFX lose this much fidelity. I caught Riot AdamUnicorn this morning, who had a bit of time, and he touched this up (it was a super quick fix!)

I just verified that the fix works, and it'll be on PBE tomorrow. This should hit live in 7.19. :)
